name: Stargaze (itch) (Susana's Limas, DiogoAlexof)
description:
Stargaze is a multiplayer game that requires 2 players, one plays as Engineer and the other as Navigator. You play as crew members of a ship that broke down and got hit by a meteor and you are now stranded in space. You were unable to join the rest of the crew and escape so, in order to return home, you need to work together to repair the ship.

The game is a cooperative online game paired with Steamworks, in order to sync, the players must both add the game to Steam as a non-Steam game

In order to play the game both players have to add this game to Steam's Library in order to connect to the server. Invite your friends to play through the friend's list or create a room!

---------------------------------INFO---------------------------------

YEAR

2022

GENRE

Puzzle, CO-OP

PLATFORM

PC

DEVELOPMENT TIME

2-3 MONTHS

TEAM

Coolbeans Studios

Stargaze is an university project on which I worked as the 3D artist and Art Director / UI/ UX Designer. The game was developed by 3 other people alongside me, Gonçalo Rodrigues & Diogo Figueiredo as Lead Gameplay Programmers & Network Engineers and Mariana Oliveira as the main Game Designer & Story Writer. It's a game made with care and love but far from perfect, enjoy <3
